name: Paul Sauer 2006
description: ‘Iconic blend led by Cabernet Sauvignon, with Cabernet Franc, Merlot - 65/20/15 in 06; classic style after more modern 05; impressively powerful: dense, richly layered fruit shows remarkable depth and complexity. 2 yrs new Fr oak effortlessly absorbed.’ - Platter’s SA Wine Guide, 5* (2010)
